item.title: Trick or Tips 005 {R}
item.description: Trick or Tips Ever tumbled on a code chunk that made you say: "I should have known this f_ piece of code long ago!" Chances are you have, frustratingly, just like we have, and on multiple occasions too.

item.title: Custom tick marks with R's base graphics system
item.description: Context If you are using R’s base graphics system for your plots and if you like customizing your plots, you may have already wondered how to custom the tick marks of your plots!

item.title: Gantt charts in R
item.description: Gantt charts Gantt charts are a very useful way to organize projects into milestones and tasks visually. They are also dead useful when comes the time to create a timeline for a project, whether it be for a research project, field work or grant applications.

item.title: Animations in R: Time series of erythemal irradiance in the St. Lawrence
item.description: The “need” for animations As part of my PhD thesis, I am currently characterizing the intensity of multiple stressors in the estuary and gulf of St.

item.title: Add icons on your R plot
item.description: Introduction Icons are very popular on websites to improve the visual grepping (i.e. visual optimization of eyeball search). We all know how to go at the top or the bottom of a website clicking on chevrons ( ).

item.title: Make your R plot Hylian
item.description: Below are presented the 5 steps you need to make your plot a Hylian one! May the triforce be with you! Open R and download the font The Triforce font is available on line.
